name: Pixel Battle Survival
description:
Battlegrounds Pixel, the real Battle Royale game for online multiplayer disputes on a quarantined island dominated craft.

Battle in multiplayer online games in the open world and various game modes! Survive the battlefields, improve your shooting skills and develop new PVP tactics!
Jump to the island in quarantine, find the best service, kill the enemies. Players are scattered around the island unarmed and must find and use various weapons and items to eliminate opponents. Find the best weapons you can: assault rifle, pixel gun, smg, machine guns and other weapons.
